sections.title: Introduction
sections.content: Veiled is a browser-based RPG that brings mystery and magic to the LED matrix, with real-time rendering and interactive gameplay.

sections.title: Features
sections.content:
- RPG gameplay
- Real-time LED matrix rendering
- Unique visual effects

sections.title: Hardware Used
sections.content:
- Raspberry Pi 4 Model B
- RGB LED Matrix Panel

sections.title: How it Works
sections.content: Veiled streams game frames to the LED matrix using Node.js and the `node-pixel-pusher` library, allowing for interactive, real-time visuals.

sections.title: Conclusion
sections.content: Veiled combines browser-based RPG mechanics with creative hardware display.
